CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV tells MOT about videotaping and explains warm-up task to MOT . MOT sits down in little chair and puts CHI down on the floor . CHI is standing amidst the toys in the center of the room
CHI extends the football toward MOT
CHI looks at the other toys on the floor
MOT looks down at the other toys on the floor
CHI looks down at the toys
CHI walks forward toward the other toys and drops the football
<aft> CHI looks back toward the dropped football
<bef> CHI wobbles slightly off balance but regains his stance
CHI bends over and picks up the toy car
CHI straightens and looks at MOT
MOT moves into the other chair
CHI turns to watch MOT cross the room
CHI takes wavering steps while holding the toy car out slightly in front of himself
MOT puts her hands out to receive the car
CHI walks toward MOT holding car out in front of him
MOT places car on the floor at her feet
CHI turns to face other side of the room
<aft> MOT rolls the car across the carpet
CHI watches the car as it rolls across the floor
CHI walks over to the other toys scattered on the floor
CHI bends over and picks up a toy duck
<aft> CHI turns and faces MOT holding duck extended in front of himself
MOT holds out her to take the duck from CHI

MOT holds the duck up close to CHI face as she squeezes it
CHI takes the duck from MOT

CHI drops duck and walks forward
CHI bends over and picks up football

CHI turns around looking at the floor
CHI stands over the toys on the floor and looks at them
CHI turns around scanning the floor until he spots the football
MOT watches CHI walk over to the football
CHI walks over to the football but instead of picking it up he begins to examine the contents of the wastebasket closely
CHI lifts his head slightly away from the wastebasket
just after CHI last utterance bang is heard from undiscernible source
CHI spins around looking at the floor
<$=1> MOT lifts her hands in the air and looks at CHI
CHI takes a few steps forward
CHI bends over dropping the football and picks up the jack+in+the+box

the ball rolls out of MOT's reach and under the table
MOT sits back in her chair
CHI walks over to the table

the wires for the data apparatus are under the table

<$=1> MOT pulls CHI out and sits him in the center of the room

INV enters the room at 12:34:13 . INV sets up small scale activities and leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place . INV comes back into the room at 12:41:00 to set up the Forbidden Object activity .
CHI is in sassy seat and INV has MOT sit beside him in the little chair . CHI holds onto the wooden boards with holes in it
INV opens the drawer which contains Forbidden Object
MOT looks down at the drawer
INV takes the Forbidden Object out of the drawer , places it on the table and sets it into motion
MOT leans forward and glances from object to CHI
CHI smiles at the object . CHI stares at the object and reaches up toward it
<$=1> MOT places her hand on CHI lightly preventing him from touching the object
MOT withdraws her hand to her lap
CHI stares intently at the object
<$=1> MOT glances from object to CHI
CHI grins . CHI stares at the object and glances down at the toy that is in his hand
MOT reaches up and intercepts CHI hand reaching for the object
CHI is looking at something behind the table
MOT sees that CHI is reaching up toward something other than the forbidden object . <aft> MOT looks up at the data apparatus behind the table

CHI looks at the Forbidden Object
MOT points at the Forbidden object
CHI looks down at the toy slinky on the table
MOT continues to look at CHI
CHI looks at INV while holding a toy in each hand
MOT is still looking closely at CHI
CHI moves the slinky up to touch the Forbidden Object with it
CHI smiles while he stares at the object
<$=1> MOT shakes her head indicating no
CHI glances off to the side

CHI looks from MOT to the object
CHI still stares at the object
